author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: SC man decapitates 2-week-old puppy in front of kids
text:
A cruel canine-hating South Carolina man allegedly decapitated a 2-week-old puppy, as his girlfriend and her two children watched in horror.
James Xavier Quattlebaum, 25, mercilessly cut the head off a young pooch with a kitchen knife after an argument on Saturday at about 3:14 a.m., cops said. A 7-year-old and an 11-year-old watched as the heartless killer beheaded the puppy.
WRDW James Xavier Quattlebaum of South Carolina is accused of decapitating a puppy in front of his girlfriend and her children. He had come home high on drugs and "beheaded several puppies" beforehand, his girlfriend, Tarsha Hankinson said, according to KRON4.
Aiken Public Safety James Xavier Quattlebaum's mugshot. "You don't get over nothing like that. See all that blood and the dog decapitated in front of you? You don't get over that," neighbor Mary Ella Byrd told WRDW . "He had no right doing that dog like that. He should be punished."
WRDW James Xavier Quattlebaum cut the dog's head off because of an argument with his girlfriend, according to reports. Officers found Quattlebaum in the bedroom, covered in blood and animal fur. They searched the home and found the puppy's body in the trash, according to reports. As he was being arrested, the alleged puppy killer spit in an officer's face, a local news station reported.
He is being charged with criminal domestic violence, ill treatment of animals, two charges for unlawful conduct towards a child and throwing bodily fluid on a officer, police said.
